title: Game Progress Route
content:
right to the northwest will lead to the Last Light Inn that the Harpers pointed you toward. In fact, you’ll find them at the entrance to the place so move toward them for a cutscene.

Reach Moonrise Towers Talk to Jaheira Get Help from the Cleric Isobel Find Protection from the Shadow Curse

They’ll allow you in and you’ll be able to meet Jaheira for the first time. She’ll use some nature magic to root you in place, to which you have the following options to respond with:

Just this once, I wish
